month.title: New Books at Reynolds Library
month.description: RSS feed for new and recommended books at J. Sargeant Reynolds Community College Library

item.title: Feed me! : writers dish about food, eating, weight, and body image / edited by Harriet Brown.
Greasy rider : two dudes, one fry-oil-powered car, and a cross-country search for a greener future / Greg Melville.
The green-collar economy : how one solution can fix our two biggest problems / Van Jones with Ariane Conrad.
The reader's corner : essays for developing readers / Carol Kanar.
The soloist : a lost dream, an unlikely friendship, and the redemptive power of music / Steve Lopez.

Alphabet juice : the energies, gists, and spirits of letters, words, and combinations thereof, their roots, bones, innards, piths, pips, and secret parts, tinctures, tonics, and essences, with examples of their usage foul and savory / Roy Blount, Jr.
Nineteen minutes : a novel / Jodi Picoult.
Early spring : an ecologist and her children wake to a warming world / Amy Seidl.
Animals make us human : creating the best life for animals / Temple Grandin and Catherine Johnson.

PDR guide to drug interactions, side effects, and indications.
A revolution down on the farm : the transformation of American agriculture since 1929 / Paul K. Conkin.
